sourcesContent:
<script setup>

</script>

<template>
  <input v-model="newTaskDescription" placeholder="Enter a description"/>
  <button @click="addTask(description)">Add Task (enter description)</button>

</template>

<script>
import api from "@/services/api";
import {ref} from "vue";

const newTaskDescription = ref("")

export default {

  methods: {
    async addTask(description) {
      try {
        await api.addTasks(description);
        JSON.stringify({ description: newTaskDescription.value })
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Erreur lors de la récupération du titre :', error);
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>


<style scoped>

</style>
